S.FORM: Isaias Afwerki 2 bulad 2 demiad, Isaias Afwerki, u misingkiway. 1946 a mihca nalecuhan) u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Eritrea ayza sa ci Isaias Afwerki, micakat a demiad sa i 1993 a mihca 5 bulad 24 demiad. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government
